definition: first of the ten Heavenly Stems 十天干[shi2 tian1 gan1]/(used for an unspecified person or thing)/first (in a list, as a party to a contract etc)/letter "A" or roman "I" in list "A, B, C", or "I, II, III" etc/armor plating/shell or carapace/(of the fingers or toes) nail/bladed leather or metal armor (old)/ranking system used in the Imperial examinations (old)/civil administration unit in the baojia 保甲[bao3 jia3] system (old)/ancient Chinese compass point: 75°
one side/other/different/lateral component of a Chinese character (such as 刂[dao1], 亻[ren2] etc)

sentences.english: Objective To evaluate the diagnostic value of ultrasonography in primary hyperparathyroidism.
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨原发性甲状旁腺功能亢进的超声诊断价值。

sentences.english: This is the gross appearance of a parathyroid carcinoma.
sentences.chinese: 甲状旁腺癌的大体外观。

sentences.english: There was no hypoparathyroidism and recurrent nerve paralysis in this group.
sentences.chinese: 术后无永久性甲状旁腺功能减退和喉返神经麻痹。

sentences.english: Therefore, investigations were not cases of pathological parathyroid organizations see.
sentences.chinese: 所以病例术后病理均未查见甲状旁腺组织。

sentences.english: It was possible they would not reactivate immediately.
sentences.chinese: 这三个甲状旁腺无法立即激活的可能性是存在的。

sentences.english: Objective To discuss the brain-CT manifestation of hypoparathyroidism.
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨甲状旁腺机能减退症患者的颅脑CT表现。

sentences.english: Parathyroid carcinomas infiltrate surrounding structures in the neck.
sentences.chinese: 甲状旁腺癌浸润周围的颈部组织。

sentences.english: The culprits in all this are the parathyroid glands.
sentences.chinese: 这一切的罪魁祸首就是甲状旁腺。

sentences.english: If hyperparathyroidism lead to hypercalciuria , causing urinary tract stones.
sentences.chinese: 如甲状旁腺功能亢进导致高尿钙症，引起尿路结石。

sentences.english: Objective To observe differences of parathyroid function and calcium-phosphate metabolism between before and after kidney transplantation (KT).
sentences.chinese: 目的比较肾移植前后甲状旁腺功能和钙磷代谢的变化。

sentences.english: Increased secretion of parathyroid hormone could also have been a factor, they add.
sentences.chinese: 甲状旁腺素分泌的增加也可能是一个原因。
